text:
<!channel>
*SCHOOL'S OUT FOR SUMMER! :sunny::sunny::sunny: Today is the last day of our pilot e-mentoring programme!*
As mentioned, we'll be pulling the data for our final leaderboards shortly after 11:59pm this evening, so be sure to close out your conversations with your Mentees by then!
You'll still be able to access the platform until mid-next week and we'll be sharing data about the impact you've had, based on real feedback from the students.
>As before, feel free to exchange details with your mentees if you'd like to continue the conversation

<!channel>
*SCHOOL'S OUT FOR SUMMER! :sunny::sunny::sunny: Today is the last day of our pilot e-mentoring programme!*
As mentioned, be sure to close out your conversations with your Mentees by 11:59pm this evening as we'll be pulling the data for our final leaderboards shortly after!
You'll still be able to access the platform until mid-next week and we'll be sharing data about the impact you've had, based on real feedback from the students.
> Feel free to exchange details with your mentees if you'd like to continue the conversation

> Otherwise, THANK YOU so much for being part of our very first under 18s Prospela pilot. We wouldn't have been able to do any of this without your impressive efforts & commitment. :hero::clapping::clapping::hero:

<!channel>
*SCHOOL'S OUT FOR SUMMER! :sunny::sunny::sunny: Today is the last day of our pilot e-mentoring programme!*
As mentioned, be sure to close out your conversations with your Mentees by 11:59pm this evening as we'll be pulling the data for our _final leaderboards_ shortly after!
You'll still be able to access the platform until mid-next week and we'll be sure to share data about the impact you've had, based on real feedback from the students.
> Feel free to exchange details with your mentees if you'd like to continue the conversation

> Otherwise, THANK YOU so much for being part of our very first under 18s Prospela pilot. We wouldn't have been able to do any of this without your impressive efforts & commitment. :hero::clapping::clapping::hero:
> We'll digest running a larger-scale programme in Sept/Oct and would love for you to be part of it!

<!channel>
*SCHOOL'S OUT FOR SUMMER! :sunny::sunny::sunny: Today is the last day of our pilot e-mentoring programme!*
As mentioned, be sure to finish up your conversations / Career Plans with your E-Mentors by 11:59pm this evening as we'll be pulling the data for our _final leaderboards_ then and we can't guarantee that they'll be available beyond that! You'll still be able to access the platform until mid-next week when we'll be sharing the final leaderboards and prizes!
> Feel free to exchange details with your E-Mentors if you'd like to continue the conversation.

> Otherwise, THANK YOU so much for being part of our *very first* Prospela pilot!! We wouldn't have been able to do any of this without your impressive efforts & commitment and are truly flattered that you gave up your precious time to be part of it - so thank you! We hope you learned something and made a few new professional connections that you can build upon and hope to see you at our next (larger scale) programme in Sept/Oct :hero::clapping::clapping::hero:

<!channel>
*SCHOOL'S OUT FOR SUMMER! :sunny::sunny::sunny: Today is the last day of our pilot e-mentoring programme!*
As mentioned, be sure to finish up your conversations / Career Plans with your E-Mentors by 11:59pm this evening as we'll be pulling the data for our _final leaderboards_ then and we can't guarantee your E-Mentors will be available beyond that. You'll still be able to access the platform until mid-next week when we'll be sharing the final leaderboards and prizes!
> Feel free to exchange details with your E-Mentors if you'd like to continue the conversation.

> Otherwise, THANK YOU so much for being part of our *very first* Prospela pilot!! We wouldn't have been able to do any of this without your impressive efforts & commitment and are truly flattered that you gave up your precious time to be part of it - so thank you! We hope you learned something and made a few new professional connections along the way that you can build upon. Hope to see you at our next (larger scale) programme in Sept/Oct!! :hero::clapping::clapping::hero:

<!channel>
*SCHOOL'S OUT FOR SUMMER! :sunny::sunny::sunny: Today is the last day of our pilot e-mentoring programme!*
As mentioned, be sure to close out your conversations / Career Plans with your Mentees by 11:59pm this evening as we'll be pulling the data for our _final leaderboards_ shortly after! You'll still be able to access the platform beyond this (but any interactions won't count towards your final ranking). We'll also be sharing data about the impact you've had, based on real feedback from the students.
> Feel free to exchange details with your mentees if you'd like to continue the conversation.

> Otherwise, THANK YOU so much for being part of our *very first* over 18s Prospela pilot!! We wouldn't have been able to do any of this without your impressive efforts & commitment and are truly flattered that you gave up your precious time to be part of it - so thank you! :hero::clapping::clapping::hero:

> If you have LinkedIn, be sure to add your Prospela volunteer experience to it! :sunglasses:

<!channel>
*UNI'S OUT FOR SUMMER! :sunny::sunny::sunny: Today is the last day of our pilot e-mentoring programme!*
As mentioned, be sure to finish up your conversations / Career Plans with your E-Mentors by 11:59pm this evening as we'll be pulling the data for our _final leaderboards_ then and we can't guarantee your E-Mentors will be available beyond that. You'll still be able to access the platform but any communications won't count towards your final ranking. We'll also be sharing the final leaderboards and prizes next week!
> Feel free to exchange details with your E-Mentors if you'd like to continue the conversation.

> Otherwise, THANK YOU so much for being part of our *very first* over 18s Prospela pilot!! We wouldn't have been able to do any of this without your impressive efforts & commitment and are truly flattered that you gave up your precious time to be part of it - so thank you! We hope you learned something and made a few new professional connections along the way that you can build upon. Hope to see you at our next (larger scale) programme in Sept/Oct!! :hero::clapping::clapping::hero:

> If you have a LinkedIn profile, be sure to add your Prospela experience to it! Employers will love that you've had exposure to their industries / roles! Also you can find me (Emma Sullivan) and Dexter Boyce on LinkedIn if you'd like to add us as connections :sunglasses: and follow Prospela here on LinkedIn: <https://uk.linkedin.com/company/prospela> and Twitter: <https://twitter.com/ProspelaCo>

hope you are well. We want to say that we have really enjoyed having you be part of our Summer E-Mentoring Pilot Study and hope you have enjoyed it too! The students have given us some incredibly *POSITIVE* feedback for all of you Rockstar E-Mentors and hugely appreciate your help!

We now just need you to complete this quick debrief form (Link is here: <https://prospela.typeform.com/to/wPkrSE>)

We want to hear your *HONEST* opinion about the experience. We'll be using your feedback to help us build the product in the future so don't tell us "It was great" if you didn't feel that way! 
Don't worry, you won't hurt our feelings :smiley:

Many thanks for this in advance :bowtie:
